content.text: I'm so sorry to hear that you are dissatisfied with your school life so far.  What are some of the things that make you feel this way?

Hey there! Thanks for asking. I think the main thing that's been bothering me is that I feel like I'm not learning anything that I'm actually interested in. I'm really passionate about programming and I wish I could take more classes in that area.
I see. I'm glad that you have found something that you're passionate about. I think it's really important to follow your interests, even if it means taking some extra classes outside of school.
Yeah, I agree. I've been thinking about taking some online courses in programming. I've also been looking into starting my own business in the tech industry.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm sure you'd be really successful in that field.
Thanks! I'm excited to see where my future takes me.
I'm sure you'll do great things
